analysis.current_status: Production-ready dashboard with testing, deployment, and distributed features

milestones.name: Core Dashboard Enhancements
milestones.description: Improve real-time capabilities, error tracking, and monitoring

tasks.title: Add real-time metrics updates via WebSocket
tasks.description: Replace manual refresh with WebSocket-based real-time updates for metrics, errors, and node status
tasks.technical_notes: Implement Flask-SocketIO for real-time dashboard updates

tasks.title: Implement automatic error refresh polling
tasks.description: Add background polling for error aggregation without manual refresh

tasks.title: Add error severity categorization
tasks.description: Categorize errors by severity (critical/error/warning) with trending analytics

tasks.title: Implement error filtering and search
tasks.description: Add filtering/search capabilities to error log with regex support

tasks.title: Add TODO priority tagging system
tasks.description: Implement priority tagging and smart sorting for TODO items

tasks.title: Make git branch info clickable with commit links
tasks.description: Add clickable links to git branch info showing commit history

tasks.title: Rebuild features tracking with status workflow
tasks.description: Implement spec → in progress → review → completed workflow for features
tasks.technical_notes: Integrate with existing feature.py CLI tool

tasks.title: Link features to related TODOs and commits
tasks.description: Create bidirectional links between features, TODOs, and git commits
dependencies: Rebuild features tracking with status workflow

tasks.title: Build automated documentation generation
tasks.description: Generate API and feature documentation from code comments and docstrings

tasks.title: Add API documentation viewer
tasks.description: Create interactive API documentation panel in dashboard

milestones.name: Distributed Systems Improvements
milestones.description: Enhance cluster management and node coordination

tasks.title: Improve node health monitoring
tasks.description: Add comprehensive health checks with alerting for node failures

tasks.title: Implement load balancer optimization
tasks.description: Optimize task distribution across cluster nodes based on resources

tasks.title: Add cluster visualization dashboard
tasks.description: Create visual representation of cluster topology and task flow

tasks.title: Enhance SSH connection pooling
tasks.description: Implement connection pooling for improved distributed operations

tasks.title: Expand test coverage for distributed features
tasks.description: Add integration tests for cluster coordination and node management

tasks.title: Add E2E tests for workflow automation
tasks.description: Create end-to-end tests for complete feature workflows

tasks.title: Document cluster setup procedures
tasks.description: Create comprehensive guide for multi-node cluster setup

tasks.title: Create troubleshooting guide
tasks.description: Document common issues and solutions for distributed operations

cross_project_dependencies.description: Browser agent integrates with Architect API for task tracking
Can track edu apps as project in dashboard

technical_risks: WebSocket scalability with multiple concurrent users
SSH connection management across unreliable networks
resource_risks: Requires distributed test environment for cluster features
mitigation_strategies: Implement connection pooling and retry logic
Use Docker containers for local cluster testing
